title: The Adventures of Samurai Cat
description: Sixteenth-Century Japan â€” a land suffering through the long night of Sengoku Jidai, the Age of Battles, a period of constant civil war, of anarchy and terror, of savagery and bloodshed and lots of other good stuff. The social order was shaken to its core; class distinctions blurred as military prowess became all-important. With luck, even a peasant could slash a place for himself among the mighty.Even a cat...
author: Mark E.  Rogers
